channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 26 Best Shows on Amazon Prime Right Now (November 2024)
item.description: Citadel: Diana, The Boys, and Fallout are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.

item.title: Six-Word Sci-Fi: Stories Written by You
item.description: Here's this month's prompt, how to submit, and an illustrated archive of past favorites.

item.title: The Best Veterans Day Mattress Deals (2024)
item.description: Get ahead of the Black Friday sales with these Veterans Day mattress deals on all our editor-tested picks.

item.title: Invasive Species Are Threatening the Quality of New York’s Tap Water
item.description: Zebra mussels, hydrilla, and now a water flea have made their homes in New Croton Reservoir.
